column4: Anyone up for helping a linux newbie diagnose his ubuntu lockup problem?
how much ram do you have in that pc
how much ram do you have in that pc
Also check how much you are swapping to disk
using a lot of ram?  any idea what for?  is that a gig you have and almost all is used?
Are you also running desktop effects and such?
You are having lockups and slow-downs right... you are using a lot of ram and that may be where you will find an answer
What all do you have open...?
You need to be looking at that when you are having problems
If onboard video, you may also want to see how much it is using
